articles.author: Clare Duffy
articles.title: Trump announces a $500 billion AI infrastructure investment in the US - CNN
articles.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son and Chairman of Oracle appeared is set to appear at the White House Tuesday afternoon alongside President Donald Trump and other tech CEOs to announce a massive private sector investment in artificial intellig…
articles.content:
Three top tech firms on Tuesday announced that they will create a new company, called Stargate, to grow artificial intelligence infrastructure in the United States.

articles.author: James Waldron
articles.title: HHS gives Moderna $590M to 'accelerate' bird flu vaccine trials - Fierce Biotech
articles.description: The U.S. | The government wants Moderna to push forward with various bird flu vaccines as well as mRNA shots for other influenza strains with pandemic potential.
